page.title: 05Industry in Solihull(2).
page.content: {Monkspath Business Park}ajoins the {Cranmore Industrial Estate.}It was established more recently and consists of 38 units. They are mainly warehouses although two of the firms manufactured exhibition stands. Banks, planted with mainly deciduous trees, surround the units, screening them from the new housing estates. There are still about 1/3 of the units unoccupied. About 50% of the work force live locally. They like getting to work easily and all agreed that they enjoyed working in pleasant surroundings. All the information on these two pages about industry came from surveys and interviews carried on the industrial estate.
